summary: The life story of the highly-influential Chinese philosopher, Confucius.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|Xun Zhou|Jianbin Chen|Quan Ren|Yi Lu|Lu Yao|Kai Li|Ban Wang|Huanshan Xu|Jingwu Ma|Yanjun Bi|Huichun Wang|Wenbo Li|Dongyan Ma|Jinming Kan|Fengchao Liu|Chen Rui|Shera Li|Yongchen Liu|Xingzhe Zhang|Zhenyu Qiao|Gong Jie|Gao Tian|Weidong Chen|Qingyuan Wang|Ma Yong|Li Huan|Zhiwu Dong|Liansheng Wu|Gu Yang|Wenguang Huang|Li Chunpeng|Chen Liejun|Tang Muchun|Yongqing Ji|Jiantao Zhou|Minghan Luo|Ran Chen|Huang Jiao|Kaili Zhang
title: Confucio
